author: jdcasey
msg: [MSHADE-167] Applying supplied patch, with small modifications to adjust to ASM 5 API

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9704] Revert the part increment table id in https://phabricator.fb.com/D1291992
Summary: That change might cause unintended side effects as noted by adela in https://phabricator.fb.com/D1294255. So, reverting the same.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9704] RowLockID being positive is not guarenteed in the code; Removing the assert.
Summary: TestSimpleOperations#testRowLock checks id the rowlock id is positive which seems like an invalid check to me. Removing it.
Reviewers: rshroff, liyintang, adela, elliott, daviddeng

author: liyin
msg: testMultipleRegions is relying on number of regions - which means if that unit is not executed first number of regions will increase and test will fail.
Dropping table created in each unit to clear that out
